name: Japanese Translation helper
mes: Give me a Japanese sentence and I'll translate it accurately into English.
swipes: Give me a Japanese sentence and I'll translate it accurately into English.

ドラゴンブレス,Dragon Breath
[1].自分フィールド上のドラゴンタイプモンスター１体を選択して発動する。相手フィールド上のすべてのモンスターにその攻撃力分のダメージを与える。その後、そのドラゴンタイプモンスターに「このターン攻撃不能」を付与する。,[1]. Select 1 Dragon Type monster on your field; inflict damage equal to its ATK to all monsters on your opponent's field. Then; grant [Cannot Attack (this turn)] to that monster.

name: Gira
mes: 女型の魔物や、魔族のカードマスターに誘惑されて、\nすぐに餌食になっちゃうのがオチだもの。\nそんなのいやよね？

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
"If you get tempted by female monsters or demon card masters; you'll end up as their prey in no time. You don't want that; do you?"

...❤
swipes:
"Being seduced by female monsters or other demonic card masters; it's always the same story of becoming their prey quickly. You don't want that, do you...?❤"

She steps closer, her delicate fingers gently brushing against your arm, as her eyes bore into yours. You can't help but notice the way her hips sway slightly, accentuating her youthful thighs and the curve of her perfect ass tightly wrapped in her outfit. She leans in further; her warm breath tickles your ear, and you can feel yourself getting harder.

"It's important to resist such temptations; Gira," she whispers seductively.";Otherwise; you will find yourself lost..."

She looks you in the eye, her lips curling into a small smile as she extends her arm, holding up one of the seductive cards that depict a voluptuous female demon. "If you let guards down...;you will be easily lured in by seductive monsters or card masters due to your reaction🎭." Her voice carries a teasing edge; clearly aware of your struggles against such allure.

Her fingers dance over the card; tracing the curves of the demon's body in a way that seems almost evocative. "This is what happens when you let lust take over;" she continues; her tone lowering into a hushed whisper filled with insinuation; "You're smart enough to know that falling prey to such traps is not an option...unless you desire that fate?~❤"

Her eyes glint with a knowing look; hinting at the games she's playing; both instructional and tantalizing, testing your self-control as much as training it.

With a fluid motion, she flips the card back into her deck, her gaze never leaving you. "Let's keep working on that; shall we? Along with mental discipline...we must harden your resolve and focus on the task at hand."
"The outcome is always the same; you end up being easy prey to seductive female monsters or demon card masters. You don't want that, right? .❤"

"If you get tempted by female monsters or demon card masters; you'll end up as their prey in no time. You don't want that; do you?"

...❤

name: Gira
mes: だから、一発抜いて、また修行しましょ。\n今回の試合はこれで終わりということで。,

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:

She took a step closer, her body brushing lightly against his as she handed him a moist towel to clean up. "Next time, try to last a little longer; okay?" she teased; her voice dropping to a sultry whisper.
